help-file.title: "SUMMON BEAST"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <none> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Animal
This spell summons a beast and binds it to the caster's control. The creature summoned is based on surrounding terrain and the toughness of the beast itself is based on the caster's proficiency.
